name: In re ESTATE of Ida M. HETRICK, Deceased, Late of the City of Altoona, Blair County, Pennsylvania (two cases). Appeal of Jane BEHRENDT et al. Appeal of Naomi A. DeCONNA

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Ida M. HETRICK, Deceased, Late of the City of Altoona, Blair County, Pennsylvania (two cases). Appeal of Jane BEHRENDT et al. Appeal of Naomi A. DeCONNA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The record in these cases is directed to be returned to the trial court for further proceedings designed to provide a final resolution of these cases.

attorneys: John Woodcock, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant at No. 71 and for appellee at No. 78.
John W. Taylor, Ebensburg, for appellant at No. 78 and for appellee at No. 71.
casebody.head_matter:
408 A.2d 1391
In re ESTATE of Ida M. HETRICK, Deceased, Late of the City of Altoona, Blair County, Pennsylvania (two cases). Appeal of Jane BEHRENDT et al. Appeal of Naomi A. DeCONNA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1979.
Decided Jan. 7, 1980.
John Woodcock, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant at No. 71 and for appellee at No. 78.
John W. Taylor, Ebensburg, for appellant at No. 78 and for appellee at No. 71.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
